availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: San Francisco, San Francisco County, California

body.p:
United States of America
State of California
City and County of San Francisco } S.S:

I, F. J. Thibault, residing in the city and county of San Francisco, in the State of California, appointed by the Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, a Commissioner to take the acknowledgement and proof of the execution of deeds and other instruments in writing to be used or recorded in the Said Commonwealth of Kentucky and to administer oaths affirmations &c do solemnly swear that I will faithfully perform all the duties of such commission under and by virtue of the laws of said Commonwealth of Kentucky according to the best of my ability.
Subscribed and Sworn to before me this Fifteenth day of November A D 1864.

official seal
F. J. THIBAULT.
COMMISSIONER
FOR KENTUCKY
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
CITY & COUNTY OF SAN FRANCISCO STATE OF CALIFORNIA.

Signature
F. J. Thibault
Commissioner for Kentucky in California

Comr Deeds
California
Oath of Office of F. J. Thibault
filed 15th Dec/64
